content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements there is also a bonus garment schematic included in the pdf style meets comfort in the men s split level pullover a crochet crew neck pullover where both simple and textured stitches combine this classic crew neck sweater is a great layering option when the temperature starts to drop pair it with a t-shirt and jeans for a casual day look or layer it over a collared dress shirt for a more polished look this classic crochet mens pullover can be worn for years to come purchase the kit here 2 lion brand also has a full kit of the men s split level pullover 3 available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern **sizing** the pattern is written in men s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large to fit chest 32-33 34-36 38-40 42-44 46-48 50-52 54-56 56 - 62 **instructions included for lengthening the sleeves & torso ** **yarn notes** the sample shown in the photos is lion brand wool ease / 4 / worsted weight yarn 80% acrylic / 20% wool / 197 yds / 3 oz / 180 m / 85 g other lighter worsted weight 4 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met yardage 1 500 1 600 1 800 2 000 2 200 2 400 2 700 3 000 **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a schematic and photo tutorials where needed the sweater is worked from the bottom up with minimal seaming shoulders only the collar is then added finally sleeves are then worked directly from the armhole openings and worked and shaped down to the cuff sweater design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2022 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/mens-split-level-pullover-free-crochet-sweater-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/3qtk2 3 https //shrsl com/3qtk2
